knimeNode.name: Table Manipulator
knimeNode.shortDescription: Allows to perform several column transformations such as renaming, filtering, re-ordering and type changing.

fullDescription.intro: Allows to perform several column transformations such as renaming, filtering, re-ordering and type changing.

ports.dynInPort: Table contributing subsequent rows and columns.
ports.outPort: A table with the transformed columns from all input tables (Table 0, Table 1, Table ...)
